text: Heavenly Wang has always been delivering on their coffee consistency. However, the bread slices are tiny and butter fillings are even smaller. Did not satisfy my cravings. I will just stick with coffee for now.

Terrible service from the auntie, she was so loud and super inflexible. was trying to convert my drink to cold, and ask to pay $0.30. But how to do so if i dont have cash? She yelled at me to order hot, which is not easy to drink if you rushing. Why so inflexible, all you could have done was share some cubes of ice? Better service could be provided, really.

The auntie at the mbfc is very rude to customers. Yelling and shouting at customer for their order as if we aren't paying for our order. Horrible.
